title: Instructional Design and Technology (IDT) Integration Project from a Social Justice Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design principles and mathematics teaching experience
context.additional_context: A BYOD-based process integrating critical thinking into mathematics education design through team-based timeline creation and social justice issue analysis

learning_goals: Learners can create a timeline linking major events in IDT to contemporary social events.
Learners can develop project deliverables in math education design that incorporate social justice issues.
Learners can propose technology-based learning strategies reflecting historical context and cultural background.

resources: IDT and Social Justice-Related Open Resources

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
